pullRequest.title: [RW-5325][risk=no] replacing convert functions with mappers in CohortReviewController
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR replaces the convert functions with mappers in CohortReviewController.
Implemented Mappers and tests classes for

CohortReviewMapper
